claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Christopher Gilbert `` Chris '' Pérez  (  born August 14 , 1969  )  is an American guitarist , songwriter and author best known as lead guitarist for the Tejano band Selena y Los Dinos .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He married the frontwoman of the group , Selena , on April 2 , 1992 .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Pérez grew up in San Antonio , Texas as one of two children of Gilbert Pérez and Carmen Medina .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: By the late 1980s , Pérez was reputed among Tejano musicians for his guitar skills .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: This caught A.B. Quintanilla 's attention ; at the time , Quintanilla was seeking another guitarist for the band he produced , Selena y Los Dinos .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Between one and two years after Pérez joined the band , he and Selena began a personal relationship .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Selena 's father , Abraham Quintanilla , Jr. , forced them to end their relationship because he felt Pérez ' image might damage Selena 's career .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: They ignored his threats to disband the group , and continued their relationship .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Quintanilla Jr. fired Pérez from the band , forbidding Selena to go with him .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: They later eloped , and Selena 's father accepted the relationship and he grew to love and accept Chris as his son-in-law .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Pérez was asked to collaborate on several of Selena 's songs with A.B. and other members of the band , using his guitar to piece out melodies and incorporating a number of musical genres into their songs .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: During the early 1990s , Pérez was arrested for driving under the influence in San Antonio , but was released without charge .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Within months of his first arrest , Pérez was involved in a trashed-hotel-room incident ; he and two members of Selena y Los Dinos were intoxicated and began wrestling in a room , breaking the door and punching holes in the walls .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On March 31 , 1995 Selena was killed by her former friend and former manager of her boutiques , Yolanda Saldívar .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Chris has since remained in touch with the Quintanillas following Selena 's death .

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.

claim: Chris Pérez reviews the band Selena y Los Dinos.

premise_source_doc_sentence: Selena y Los Dinos  (  Selena and the Guys  )  was the band in which Tejano music singer Selena performed , until her murder on March 31 , 1995 .
